perk.name: Gun Pistol
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a pistol.

perk.name: Gun Magnum
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a 44 Magnum.

perk.name: Gun Hunting Rifle
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a hunting rifle.

perk.name: Gun Sniper Rifle
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a sniper rifle.

perk.name: Gun Shotgun
perk.description_key: Learn how to assembly a shotgun.

perk.name: Gun AK47
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble an AK47 Rifle.

perk.name: Gun Rocket
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a rocket launcher.

perk.name: Gun SMG
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a SMG.

perk.name: Electric Lights
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft electric lights at the decor station.

perk.name: Plumbing
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft plumbing kits to repair sinks for a clean source of drinking water.

perk.name: Oven Repair
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft Oven Repair kits to repair ovens for cooking without needing fuel.

perk.name: Lockpicks
perk.description_key: Learn how to make lockpicks to unlock gun safes.

perk.name: Animal Traps
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft animal snares and coops to capture animals.

perk.name: Wooden Bow
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a wooden bow and arrows. Level 2 unlocks iron bow and flaming arrows.

perk.name: Pottery
perk.description_key: Learning pottery can teach you how to craft clay bowls, plates and clay Amphora which are all essential for cooking recipes.

perk.name: Chainsaw
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a chainsaw.

perk.name: Auger
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble an Auger.

perk.name: Minibike
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble together a minibike.

perk.name: Crossbow
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft crossbows and bolts.

perk.name: Medical
perk.description_key: Level 1 unlocks basic medical recipes. Level 2 unlocks first aid kits and antibiotics. Level 3 unlocks herbal antibiotics.

perk.name: Traps
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised traps such as log spikes. Level two unlocks stronger trap recipes such as trussing and steel. Level 3 unlocks fire traps.

perk.name: Explosives
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft explosives such as gunpowder for bullets or traps.

perk.name: Improvised Clubs
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised club weapons. Level 1 unlocks iron club. Level 2 unlocks barbed club. Level 3 unlocks spiked club.

perk.name: Chemistry
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft chemicals and other recipes like the chemistry station, gas, glue, oil, and fuel logs.

perk.name: Hammer
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a clawhammer.

perk.name: Sledgehammer
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a sledgehammer.

perk.name: Pickaxe
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a pickaxe.

perk.name: Fireaxe
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a fireaxe.

perk.name: Garden Tools
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft various gardening tools.

perk.name: Wrench
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a wrench.

perk.name: Hunting Knife
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a hunting knife.

perk.name: Improvised Armor
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised armors. Level 1 unlocks animal hide and leather. Level 2 unlocks scrap. Level 3 unlocks Iron. Level 4 unlocks steel.

perk.name: Glassworking
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft various glass items and blocks in the forge such as windows and glass jars.

perk.name: Security
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft secure crates and doors.

perk.name: Junk Scrapping
perk.description_key: Learn how to scrap items to their base material.

perk.name: Forge
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a forge, essential for many recipes.

perk.name: Carpentry
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft carpenter kits and wooden blocks like frames.

perk.name: Masonry
perk.description_key: Learn how to build with stone. Level 1 unlocks cobblestone. Level 2 unlocks brick.

perk.name: Blunderbuss
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft a makeshift blunderbuss.
